Open Beauty Facts is an open database of more than %1$s cosmetic products (plus the ones you will contribute).
Open Beauty Facts is a open and collaborative database of cosmetic products.
Contribute to Cosmetic transparency
Scan products, take them in picture, make cosmetic transparency happen
Get the facts
Extensive information about the product you\'ve scanned, deciphered for you
Keep track of the product you use
All the cosmetic you use, in one handy list you can export
Works offline
You can add new products, even if you don\'t have an Internet connection right now
The product you scanned does not exist yet in Open Beauty Facts. Please add it.
Look at this product on Open Beauty Facts :
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Open Beauty Facts
Click here to donate to Open Beauty Facts
Help translate Open Beauty Facts
Bring the Open Beauty Facts database to your language - no technical knowledge required
Scan the products even when you are offline so as to add them to Open Beauty Facts later. The scanned products will appear here and you will be able to send them using the button below.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Beauty Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
Open Beauty Facts Android App
the free cosmetics database
The product %1$s you scanned does not exist yet in Open Beauty Facts. Can you add it?
Currently on Open Beauty Facts
Help categorize products
Add more details to help complete the product
Add a category to help complete the product
Add a category and more details to help complete the product
Products I have
Products to buy
Add to Open Beauty Facts
Examples: Nivea, L\'Oréal, etc…

You\'ll be able to add product to this list by scanning products, dragging the product card up and tapping on \"Products to buy\". You\'ll also be able to add products to this list by searching them and clicking on the + button in the top right of the product page.
Open Beauty Facts logo
